perameters.text: This is the text that the robot will speak.

actions.description: This command will make the robot speak the text that is passed to it.
This command will make the robot sit down. It will stop following you if in follow mode.
This command will make the robot stand up if sitting, or stop follwing if in follow mode and stop looking if in look mode.
This command will make the robot follow you. You can set the distance between you and the robot. The default distance is 1 meter.
This command will make the robot's arm rotate to look at you.
